app_description.message: Extension to use credentials saved in Hashicorp Vault.

input_search_placeholder.message: Name or part of the credential's name

form_invalid_element.message: The value '$2' is not valid for the field '$1'.

password_invalid_size.message: The password must be at least 7 characters long.

vault_current_token_failed.message: Failure when consulting the current token.

vault_renew_token_failed.message: Failed to renew the current token.

vault_engines_failed.message: Failure when consulting the secret engines.

failed_to_query_tab.message: Failure when trying to access the current tab information.

usernameInputsToFind.description: The name*='string' can select all inputs whose searched attribute contains the string. The 'i' is for case insensitivity.
usernameInputsToFind.message: input[name*='usuario' i],input[name*='user' i],input[name*='username' i],input[name*='user_name' i],input[name*='login' i],input[name*='userid' i],input[name*='email' i],input[name*='mail' i],input[name*='cpf' i],input[name*='accesskey' i],input[name*='accountId' i],input[type='email' i],input[type='text' i]

tokenInputsToFind.message: input[name*='token' i],input[name*='key' i],input[name*='chave' i],input[name*='accesskey' i],input[name*='accountId' i],input[type='password' i],input[type='text' i]

input_password_generator_size.message: Number of characters in the password

password_generator_at_least_one_option_m.message: At least one option needs to be selected.

password_size_is_not_a_number.message: The number of characters must be a number.

password_size_is_not_in_range.message: Accepted values ​​for the number of characters are between 1 and 40.

window_crypto_undefined.message: The password generation library is not supported by your browser.

generated_password_toggle_view_title.message: Click to show or hide the password.

generate_random_password.message: Click to generate a random password.

generate_random_token.message: Click to generate a random token.

confirm_delete_secret.message:
Are you sure you want to erase the credential:

'$1'?

This action cannot be undone.

fillCredentialsInPageSuccess.message: The credential was successfully inserted on the page.

fillCredentialsInPageFailed.message: Failed to enter credential on page.

fillTokenInPageSuccess.message: The token has been successfully inserted into the page.

fillTokenInPageFailed.message: Failed to insert token into page.

encryptedValueCannotBeNull.message: The encrypted value cannot be null.

encryptedVersionIsNotSupported.message: The '$1' version of encryption is not supported.

unwrap_hash_invalid_size.message: The hash is not the correct size.

unwrap_hash_invalid_format.message: The hash is not in the correct format.

vault_unwrap_failed.message: The hash was not found or has already been used.

input_wrap_key_placeholder.message: Enter the key name, eg: password

input_wrap_value_placeholder.message: Enter the key value, eg: ABC123@

input_wrap_json.message: Key(s) and Value(s) in json format

wrap_data_not_in_json_format.message: The inserted content is not a valid json.

ttl_is_not_a_number.message: The validity time needs to be a valid number.

ttl_is_not_in_range.message: The validity time should be between 1 and 1440 minutes (24 hours).
